subject: Re: Stride V-UP launch Unitron
preview: Hi Christine, You are most welcome. Yes, and no issues with that. It happens when there are lots of moving parts.

full_threads.body:
Hi Christine, 

You are most welcome. 

Yes, and no issues with that. It happens when there are lots of moving parts.

Hi Chris,

Hope you are well!

Thank you for the update, I checked earlier and saw that it's all live!

Did Nikki send you her additions for upload?

Thank you for all your support with this launch!

Christine

Hi Christine, 

Confirming the V-UP launch updates are now live. There was a minor delay in the transfer of updates on support ticket 106253 - Vivante Slim charger updates.
@chris done with the updates.
@chris I have push the staging to live. I'm currently redoing the task that the customer sent yesterday to the live site.
@chris I got it!
Great, thanks Chris!
Hi @rica, The https://stg-unitronmarketing-staging.kinsta.cloud has been requested to go-live on Tuesday 19th March. Can you please schedule the launch?

Hi Christine, 

Yes, indeed. We are standing by in the event there are any further updates.

Hi guys,

Happy Friday!

Just checking that we are all good to go live at 9am on Tues, 19 Mar 2024?

Thank you,

Christine
+15 mins added to momentum tracker.

Hi Rica,

Thank you, I have sent to Irene for review. Will let you know if any further changes and once she sends me the remaining items.

Thanks,

Christine
@chris done with the update, 15mins

Hi Christine,

Confirming that we have moved the A2 Posters under Posters.

Here's the link:
https://stg-unitronmarketing-staging.kinsta.cloud/moxi-v/

Let us know if you would like further changes.
Hi @rica, can you please use @glen tutorial to complete the new request from Christine? LOW priority task - ok for 16/02/24

Thanks Chris,

Those under A2 posters can just go under posters too.

Thank you,

Christine
+30 mins added to momentum tracker.

Hi Christine, 

Thanks, confirming the requested updates have been completed: https://stg-unitronmarketing-staging.kinsta.cloud/moxi-v/

chris, done with the update.
20mins

tutorial video sent to rica.
Hi @glen, can you please record a screen share for @rica on this task?

Thanks Chris,

Under the point of sale section, can we please consolidate all the posters under one - currently there are 4. Can we just have one image tile and they can download all the posters from there?

Same for the images section - can we please have one image for each of the below where they can access all the assets for these:

Campaign imagery

size comparison

360 animations

product and charger

Thanks,

Christine
+45mins added to Momentum tracker and closed.

Hi Christine, 

Confiming the latest round of requested updates have been completed: https://stg-unitronmarketing-staging.kinsta.cloud/moxi-v/

Please review and let us know if there are any further updates.
